title: Why derank?
body: not like its my fault  i lose rofl fix your game thx

replies.body: Feel free to suggest an un-exploitable and reliable way to have loss prevention for when your massive ego makes you think you deserve to win.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sVLRjoNl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-25T00:23:02.581+0000)
>
> Feel free to suggest an un-exploitable and reliable way to have loss prevention for when your massive ego makes you think you deserve to win.

Csgo is a great example of a functioning rank system

A barely functional one that would be utterly nonfunctional in LoL.

People always complain about players trying to farm S-ranks at the expense of winning the game, now imagine if that directly contributed to LP.

Also, you wont be doing too well there with those 13 deaths.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sVLRjoNl,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-07-25T01:06:59.816+0000)
>
> A barely functional one that would be utterly nonfunctional in LoL.
> 
> People always complain about players trying to farm S-ranks at the expense of winning the game, now imagine if that directly contributed to LP.
> 
> Also, you wont be doing too well there with those 13 deaths.

Yeah i will, and its waaaay better than the average autofilled adc in this elo
